p: Records of CHIKV infection cases in Bolivia are extremely scarce. However, CHIKV circulated in this country since March 2015, when 204 cases were reported ( Carbajo and Vezzani, 2015). In 2017, 3,367 cases were reported across the country (including clinically diagnosed only) ( Escalera-Antezana et al., 2018; Figure 1B).
